title: Hour 1: All that Jazz
description:
Jay Williams and Chris Russo discuss if they believe that the Nets should bring back both Kevin Durant and Kyrie Irving. They guys react to the news on the Jazz no longer simply dismissing calls on Donovan Mitchell and debate what would the Knicks acquiring him mean for New York. Stick around to hear the crew talk about Tiger Woods' comments on LIV Golf and if the tour is good for the sport of golf. Domonique Foxworth and Louis Riddick debate whether Tom Brady being ranked the fourth best QB is a proper rating.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: The Jazz are no longer dismissing calls on Mitchell.
